column14: This is one of my favorite daily-use products.  My husband was given a bottle of this foaming cleanser during a post-surgical hospital stay and I gave it a try.  It is fabulous for times when I do not want to, or cannot, take a shower but want to freshen up.  It's also great for an evening face cleanser.  It does a great job of eliminating odors, gently cleaning skin, and it smells pleasant, a bit like vanilla to me.

column14: Discovered this soap while in the local hospital where it was the standard shower soap for patients.  It is order free, soft and does a good job cleaning. I'm using it in place of Dove soap to tell you how gentle it is.
